facilities.heading: Cell Processing Center (CPC)
facilities.description: Our in-house CPC ensures maximum cell freshness, safety, and treatment effectiveness through pharmaceutical-grade sterile processing.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: To maximize the effectiveness of stem cell treatment, our clinic has established a Cell Processing Center (CPC) within our medical facility.
introduction.paragraph2: We are committed to delivering highly fresh and high-quality stem cells to patients in the best possible condition.

cpc.title: What is CPC?
cpc.description: CPC (Cell Processing Center: 細胞培養加工室) is a specialized facility for processing and culturing cells used in regenerative medicine and cell therapy, ensuring a sterile and clean environment.
features: Managed under strict standards equivalent to pharmaceutical manufacturing
High cleanliness due to cleanroom structure
24-hour quality control system by dedicated culture specialists

quality.title: Quality Appeal of Stem Cells
quality.description: Our self-fat-derived stem cells maintain a survival rate of over 95%. Under a microscope, they appear healthy, uniform, and spindle-shaped — a crucial sign of their good condition.
features: Maintaining a uniform and beautiful form
Retaining proliferative capacity and differentiation potential
Being delivered in a fresh state at the time of administration
Directly contributing to the stability and safety of clinical effects

equipment.title: Latest Equipment to Protect Stem Cells

safetyCabinet.title: Biological Safety Cabinet
safetyCabinet.description: A device for aseptic operations. It protects cells and specimens aseptically, while also protecting operators and the environment from biohazards. It ensures a thoroughly clean space with HEPA filters and UV sterilization.

co2Incubator.title: CO2 Incubator
co2Incubator.description: Constantly maintains the temperature, humidity, and CO2 concentration essential for stem cell culture. Enables stable proliferation of cells in an optimal environment.

microscope.title: Inverted Microscope
microscope.description: A microscope that allows observation of living cells directly in their culture vessels. It continuously confirms cell morphology and growth processes, always grasping their healthy state.

passBox.title: Pass Box
passBox.description: A system used for transferring items between clean rooms or sterile rooms and the outside environment. With an interlock function that prevents both doors from opening simultaneously, thereby maintaining constant cleanliness and airtightness.

centrifuge.title: Centrifuge
centrifuge.description: Essential for cell separation and processing. Ensures precise handling of cell samples with controlled centrifugal force for optimal cell quality and viability.

items.title: High Cell Survival Rate (95% or more)
items.description: Cultivation starts immediately after fat collection to minimize damage.

items.title: Long-term Preservation with Liquid Nitrogen (-196°C)
items.description: Preserved in a semi-permanently usable state, can be administered at the necessary timing.

items.title: Administered in a Highly Fresh State
items.description: After cultivation, it is quickly administered intravenously to maximize regenerative power.

items.title: Passage Limit (up to 4 times)
items.description: Prevents aging and risks due to excessive cell division, ensuring safety.

items.title: Culture Specialists Permanently Stationed at CPC
items.description: Experienced cultivation specialists constantly monitor and manage cells, protecting quality.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.paragraph1: We are thoroughly committed to the "quality" and "safety" of stem cell treatment. Our in-house CPC and state-of-the-art equipment, along with a management system by experienced cultivation specialists.
conclusion.paragraph2: All of these form the foundation for patients to receive treatment with peace of mind. We will continue to deliver the highest standard of stem cell treatment.

cta.title: Experience World-Class Care
